About us

A Michelin Star in 2024 demonstrates that the journey we've all embarked on together continues to uplift us day after day. But food, service, and time spent at the table together mean more than awards.

Book a table Open menu

Our story

Located in the heart of London, we firmly believe that the best meals originate from the intersection of craft, compassion, and character. What started as a small concept, a passion and respect for those ingredients and the team behind them, has grown into a full experience born of curiosity, discipline and a humble obsession with detail.

Our menu is inspired by both London life and the seasons; we work with a selection of trusted British suppliers and seasonal growers who lead us in direction; we let the menu be dictated by our ingredients rather than the other way around. Every plate has a purpose: we investigate known flavours made better through considerate technique, nothing more for the sake of it.

Our food

We cook from two culinary inspirations: the family-feel of Italy and the passionate punchiness of Spain. Based on the backgrounds of our chefs, the menu not only supports a communal appreciation for tradition but also presents it through a contemporary lens.

Everything is made with only the highest quality of produce. We source from British farmers, fishermen and artisans, combining the best local seasonal options with a Mediterranean flair, oils and cooked sauces, pastas, various seafood options, and finely shaded seasonings.

The menu changes per season, making us appreciate the small things. Italian restraint meets Spanish passion where comfort and sophistication, nostalgia and invention champion dishes that are technically driven but not fussy, relying solely on flavour first.

Our chefs

Behind our kitchen stand Fabio and Luis, respectively. Their indigenous lands are Italy and Spain, two nations where cuisine transcends the palate and delves into culture, nostalgia and artistry. While Fabio and Luis come from different culinary backgrounds, they possess a similar approach to kitchen values of respect for the product, technique and consistently the best taste results.

Fabio is the sophistication and restraint of Italian cuisine, the cutlery of Michelin-starred kitchens in Italy characterises a restraint that supports simplicity, balance and seasonality. Luis is the passion and personality of Spanish cuisine, it's all about the seasoning and instinct for taste that brings strength and nuance.

Both have worked in some of Europe's most difficult kitchens, where success comes from accessibility and attention to detail. But in London, they combine their experiences to create food that feels like restraint meets abundant generosity, the perfect union of Italian restraint and Spanish passion. The kitchen received 1 Michelin Star in 2024 for showing a consistent vision and collaborative approach to artistry. For Fabio and Luis, it's not a matter of bringing everything together in the end; it's about the process, honesty, seasonality, and investment in the dish so it feels personal, intentional, and unforgettable.

Our team

We're a diverse team of professionals whose backgrounds differ but whose passions and professions intersect at one common area, dedication to the best quality and consistency. We need precision, quick decisions and teamwork in the back. We need attentiveness and sincere warmth in the front. But we all operate through a common focus of loving to invest time through learning, preparation, reciprocal respect and an attention to detail every single day. This is how we achieve perfection.

We operate in an open, inclusive, collaborative space where ideas are encouraged and standards are upheld. The Michelin star received in 2024 not only validates the visions of our kitchen leaders but also substantiates the efforts behind the scenes and in front of the house that operate seamlessly each day.

Why people choose us
